description: Former President Donald Trump is ahead of his potential 2024 Republican challengers by double digits, a Tuesday Morning Consult survey found.

title: Fight breaks out at grocery store dumpsters after false post about 'free food' following power outages
description: More the 250 people fought over discarded food in dumpsters after a power outage last week at an H-E-B grocery store in Texas, authorities said.

title: Harris' mission to tackle migration root causes scores big money support but border crossings remain high
description: Vice President Kamala Harris' effort to tackle root causes of migration from Central America has yielded more than $4.2 billion in private sector commitments, but border crossings remain high amid mass migration in the Western Hemisphere.

title: The Texas attorney general has to say sorry and pay more than $3 million to former staffers who accused him of corruption—But he gets to use taxpayer money
description: Paxton called the staffers “rogue employees” after they accused him of misusing his office to help one of his campaign contributors, who also employed a woman with whom he was having an affair.

title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott issues emergency declaration amid winter weather
description: Texas Republican Gov. Greg Abbott issued an emergency declaration in several counties on Saturday to address the ice storm that has impacted the state.

title: Texas border wall construction underway, Gov. Abbott says
description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott posted a video of a wall being constructed along the state's border with Mexico on Sunday, boasting that Texas was building its own wall.

title: Texas' Abbott slams 'easy bail for criminals' after fentanyl traffickers released on bond
description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott expressed outrage that four suspects arrested for operating a fentanyl lab in Houston were released on bond just a day after their arrest.

title: Texas rancher sends message to Biden: 'Do something now' before the cartels 'come and take it from us'

title: Fire at Houston airport delays flights, forces passengers and employees to temporarily evacuate terminal
description: A fire in the employee locker room at an airport in Houston delayed flights and forced passengers and employees to evacuate the terminal. No injuries were reported.

title: Texas border mission results in nearly 130 arrests over five days, targets brush, smuggling guides
description: Nearly 130 suspected human smugglers and guides were arrested in Texas over several days as part of a border mission.

title: ‘Invasion’ language continues after El Paso Walmart shooting
description: Patrick Crusius is expected to make a guilty plea for the mass shooting in El Paso, Texas. The plea would be the first conviction in a case lasting over three years.

description: The Chinese surveillance balloon that traveled into U.S. territory this week has sparked comparisons from Republicans with the ongoing crisis at the southern border.

title: Texas inmate convicted of killing 3 teens to be executed
description: John Balentine, a Texas inmate who shot and killed three teenagers in 1998, is set to be executed Wednesday. His attorneys attempted to appeal his execution, claiming racial bias.

title: Eric Adams spends coldest winter night in shelter after migrants refused to leave hotel

title: Why are some American legislators trying to ban Chinese citizens from buying land?
description: Some lawmakers have proposed banning Chinese citizens from buying US land. Critics say the proposals harken back to racist laws of the early 1900s.

title: Black Man Sentenced to Die By All-White Jury Was Executed in Texas
description: John Balentine’s death sentence was marred by racial bias. His own attorney called the proceedings a “justifiable lynching.”
